description: Greg is a 25 year old waiter at a local restaurant.When he found out from one of our scouts about what she does, he was immediately interested. He says he loves to be naked and to show off his body, and that he loves sex.Well, what better way to satisfy these passions than an appearance at Next Door Male? Watch Greg show off all of his important assets as he works himself up into a tremendous conclusion.Enjoy.
title: Greg
